text:
Power to notify withdrawal from the EU
	The Prime Minister may notify, under Article 50(2) of the Treaty onEuropean Union, the United Kingdom’s intention to withdraw from the EU.
	This section has effect despite any provision made by or under the EuropeanCommunities Act 1972 or any other enactment.
Short title
	This Act may be cited as the European Union (Notification of Withdrawal) Act2017.
